content.content: 1. For the purposes of subsection 10 (2) of the Act, a person who appeals a decision of AgriCorp under subsection 10 (1) of the Act shall, (a) file the notice of appeal with the Tribunal within 365 days of the day the appellant receives the decision; and (b) send a copy of the notice of appeal to AgriCorp.
content.raw_html:
1. For the purposes of subsection 10 (2) of the Act, a person who appeals a decision of AgriCorp under subsection 10 (1) of the Act shall,

(a) file the notice of appeal with the Tribunal within 365 days of the day the appellant receives the decision; and

(b) send a copy of the notice of appeal to AgriCorp.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
